Requirements You are holding an infused mutagen you crafted, with a level at least 2 lower than your advanced alchemy level.

You add the distilled essence of a pony tribe to the mutagen. While under the effects of the mutagen, you exhibit the features of a pony tribe. You must choose a pony heritage when you take this action and you have access to that heritage's effects for as long as the mutagen remains. This does not change your ability scores.
